name: Aegis Projector
effect: Once per turn, the first time a saving throw is failed for the bearer’s unit, change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.

name: Champion of the Imperium
effect: The range of the bearer’s Null Aegis or Deadly Unity ability is increased to 9".

name: Gift of Terran Artifice
effect: Each time the bearer makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll .

name: Radiant Mantle
effect: Each time an attack targets the bearer’s unit, if the attacking model is within 12", subtract 1 from the Hit roll .

name: Auric Mantle
restrictions: SHIELD-CAPTAIN or BLADE CHAMPION model only.
effect: Add 2 to the bearer’s Wounds characteristic.

name: Castellan’s Mark
effect: After both players have deployed their armies, you can select up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES units from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) and redeploy all of those units. When doing so, any of those units can be placed into Strategic Reserves , regardless of how many units are already in Strategic Reserves.

name: From the Hall of Armouries
effect: Add 1 to the Strength and Damage characteristics of the bearer’s melee weapons.

name: Panoptispex
restrictions: SHIELD-CAPTAIN or BLADE CHAMPION model only.
effect: While the bearer is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [IGNORES cover] ability.

name: Enhanced Voidsheen Cloak
effect: Each time an attack is allocated to the bearer, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack. If that attack was made by a PSYKER or Battle-shocked model, change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 1 instead.

name: Huntress’ Eye
effect: In your Command phase , select one enemy unit within 12" of the bearer. That unit must take a Battle-shock test .

name: Oblivion Knight
effect: While the bearer is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll . If that attack targeted an enemy PSYKER unit, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

name: Raptor Blade
effect: Add 1 to the Attacks, Strength and Damage characteristics of the bearers melee weapons. While the bearer is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy PSYKER units that are Battle-shocked , add 2 to the Attacks, Strength and Damage characteristics of the bearer’s melee weapons instead.

name: Blade Imperator
effect: Each time the bearer’s unit ends a Charge move , select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of the bearer and roll one D6: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds . Once per battle, after the bearer s unit ends a Charge move, all enemy units within 6" of the bearer must take a Battle-shock test .

name: Inspirational Exemplar
effect: The bearer has a Leadership characteristic of 5+. Once per battle, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of the bearer; that unit is no longer Battle-shocked.

name: Martial Philosopher
effect: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot and/or declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back . Once per battle, when an enemy unit ends a Normal , Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of the bearer, if the bearer’s unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6".

name: Veiled Blade
effect: Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of the bearers melee weapons. Once per battle, at the start of any Command phase , triple the bearer’s Objective Control characteristic until the end of the turn.

name: Adamantine Talisman
effect: Improve the Attacks, Strength and Damage characteristics of melee weapons equipped by the bearer by 1.

name: Augury Uplink
effect: The bearer has the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

name: Honoured Fallen (Aura)
effect: While a friendly ADEPTUS CUSTODES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS CUSTODES MOUNTED unit is within 6" of the bearer, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

name: Veteran of the Kataphraktoi
restrictions: ADEPTUS CUSTODES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS CUSTODES MOUNTED model only.
effect: In your Command phase , select one ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE or ADEPTUS CUSTODES MOUNTED unit within 6" of the bearer. Until the start of your next Command phase , that unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back .

name: Superior Creation
effect: The first time the bearer is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set the bearer back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.

name: Praesidius
effect: The bearer has the Lone Operative and Stealth abilities.

name: Fierce Conqueror
effect: At the start of the Fight phase , until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by the bearer for every 5 enemy models within 6" of the bearer (rounding down).

name: Admonimortis
effect: Improve the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by the bearer by 3, and improve the Armour Penetration and Damage characteristics of those weapons by 1.
